name: Bag
description: An non-rigid portable container that can be held by a person

name: Ball Gown
description: A formal full length dress for social occasions.

name: Belt
description: A band worn around the waist intended to hold trousers up, or simply as a fashion item

name: Bikini
description: A two-piece type of women's swimwear that is in the form of a bra and briefs

name: Blazer
description: A jacket worn as a uniform, usually less weather proof than a jacket

name: Blouse
description: A woman's shirt

name: Bra
description: Women's underwear that covers and supports the breasts

name: Camisole
description: A sleeveless tight fitting woman's undergarment that covers the torso

name: Cardigan
description: Knitted long sleeved upper body garment with a full length opening at the front fastened by a zip or buttons

name: Chemise
description: Long sleeveless undergarment

name: Coat
description: An outer garment with sleeves, that is worn over other clothes, usually for warmth. It can be waist length or longer

name: Corset
description: A garment, usually with boning, designed to clinch the waist

name: Dress
description: A garment that covers the upper body and hangs down to cover all or part of the legs

name: Dressing Gown
description: A long loose coat-like piece of clothing, usually worn before or after dressing

name: Fleece
description: A top made from Fleece material

name: Gloves
description: Hand wear

name: Hair Accessory
description: An item used for decorating or maintaining a hair style

name: Hat
description: An item of clothing that covers the head

name: Jacket
description: A waist length coat

name: Jeans
description: Informal trousers made of denim

name: Jewellery
description: A fine object intended purely for decorating the body

name: Kaftan
description: An ankle length open bodiced gown with long, wide sleeves

name: Knickers
description: Women's underwear that covers the groin

name: Lingerie
description: Women's underwear and night-wear

name: Nightgown
description: A loose comfortable dress worn as nightwear

name: Pashmina
description: A shawl made from a soft and light wool that is made from the hair around a goat's neck

name: Polo Shirt
description: Thin short sleeved top with a collar with a few buttons down a slit below the collar

name: Poncho
description: A cloak with a hole in the centre for the head

name: Pyjamas
description: Trousers and top intended for sleeping in

name: Robe
description: A loosefitting piece of clothing, usually reaches to between the knees and feet

name: Sandals
description: Footwear with an open upper that consists of straps that expose the toes

name: Scarf
description: A piece of fabric that wraps around the neck to keep the wearer warm

name: Shawl
description: A piece of fabric used to cover the head and shoulders

name: Shorts
description: Trousers that end at or above the knee

name: Skirt
description: A tubular garment that extends from the waist down to any part of the legs

name: Slippers
description: Footwear that can be slipped on to the foot without using fastenings such as laces

name: Socks
description: A fabric garment that covers the feet and ankles

name: Stockings
description: A close-fitting see-through garment that covers the foot and most of the leg

name: Sunglasses
description: Eye wear

name: Sweatshirt
description: A knitted top with long sleeves, typically lighter than a jumper

name: Swimwear
description: Garments designed for swimming

name: Tankini
description: A two-piece swimsuit, similar to a bikini but with the upper part in the form of a tank top

name: Thong
description: Underwear that doesn't cover the bottom, but has a thin strip of material that passes between the buttocks.

name: Tights
description: Close fitting leg and waist wear made of thin stretchy material

name: Top
description: Any garment for just the upper body

name: Tracksuit
description: A loose top and trousers, worn for sports, or informally

name: Trainers
description: Footwear for athletics, or a fashion shoe that is sporty in style

name: Trousers
description: A lower body garment that covers the legs and waist, constructed of two cylindrical parts, for the legs, which are joined at the top
